Articles.Content:
To Celebrate the Apollo's Mission 44th Anniversary (July 20th).

I have decided to take it upon myself to pay homage to the mission by recreating the mission on July 20th, and my learning experience with the game.

I know very little so any helpful advice/links to how to get good at this game would be fantastic, and hopefully if all goes to plan. I will be landing on the "Mun" in a months time!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1kPHZHnqDM
